name: Quintiles Benefit France
goal: Quintiles would like to introduce our company to EC members and explore how our capabilities as a fully integrated healthcare services provider could be leveraged to achieve the goals of the European Commission.  In response to projected near-term EC identified priorities, we are interested in highlighting possible applications of our biopharmaceutical product development experience to support potential research opportunities around Tuberculosis and Alzheimer’s Disease.   However, our offerings are broad and deep, and we are also keen to gain insights from the EC members as to their perspectives on how Quintiles could bring value to ongoing and future EC needs in the healthcare across a more comprehensive landscape.
